http://steamcommunity.com/id/hidden_assassin/screenshot/576674944636836507
Proof is in the link

He hasn't learned his lesson and even after he says he will stop the next round he does it again. This will be the second or third time he's been banned for same reason. (i think, judging this from him being gone for a week or so at time to time)

Hey crisis if i get banned i understand, Yes i did crowbar but i only do it to kid around with a couple people who know im joking. I did crowbar profit by accident he was AFK on Temple so i pushed him but then i left clicked hitting him as he pulled out a gun right when he came back i got nervous and ran. I understand completely if i get banned because yes i do crowbar but only a couple people. again i apologize and i will understand if i get banned and i take full responsability
Even if you ARE joking, you know you can't do that.

Thanks for being mature about it, Krull, but it's against the rules and you admitted to doing it before as well.
Banned for a day.
